sentences:
Francisco Asenjo Barbieri ( 3 August 1823 – 19 February 1894 ) was a well - known composer of the popular Spanish opera form , zarzuela .
His works include : El barberillo de Lavapiés , Jugar con fuego , Pan y toros , Don Quijote , Los diamantes de la corona , and El Diablo en el poder .
He was born and died in Madrid , appropriately , since the themes are characters of his operas are often distinctly Spanish and Madrilenian .
Among the characters featured by Barbieri are bullfighters , manolos and manolas , and even ( in Pan y toros ) the famous Spanish painter , Francisco Goya .
The character of much of Barbieri ’s work is farcical , utilizing mistaken identity and other devices to entertain the audience .
His themes deal largely with the ins and outs of love , and the relations between the upper and lower classes in nineteenth - century Spain , but there is also a distinct political character to much of his work .
The zarzuelas El barberillo de Lavapiés and Pan y toros both contain plots to overthrow the government .
In addition to his compositions , Barbieri was also an accomplished musician .
He was the founder of La España Musical ( a society for the promotion of Spanish operetta ) and the Society for Orchestral Music .
